name: Unicorn Smash
summary:
Unicorn Smash is a relaxing and beautiful Puzzle game. You have to feed baby unicorns by building rows and columns of colourful candy blocks and smash them into rainbow candies.

Unicorn Smash is created for kids, parents and their lovely grandparents to enjoy – it is indeed for the entire family to enjoy. Inspired by one of the most magical animals, the unicorn. It is crafted to help you emotionally re-charge, reduce stress, and just get a time out for yourself.
